name: Shopping Mall Smart Taxi
description:
Drive your impossible taxi in the biggest Mall of America. Enjoy the fun in realistic mega mall environment and earn cash quickly to buy new awesome and multi seating capacity easy taxi cart in Shopping Mall Smart Taxi: Family Car Taxi Games. Give family the ultimate fun of driving and shopping in your cart taxi. Follow the directions inside mega store in amazing shopping mall radio taxi drive car simulator games and easy taxi driving games. Avoid crashing & smashing during reverse car mode in this radio taxi driving simulator 3D game. Don’t forget to collect bill after ending the ride as you will need to upgrade your taxi to facilitate more customers.

Features of Shopping Mall Smart Taxi

• Best Taxi driving Simulation game
• Amazing and realistic Shopping Mall environment
• Superb HD graphics and sound effects
• Challenging Cart driving missions
• Time Management Game

Enjoy the unique gameplay and give your feedback to help us improve this game in future releases.
